products.title: Splash Ruby Vertical Blind
products.description: This slightly textured, dim-out fabric will bring a splash of colour to an interior. Available in many colours and blackout options available in the bella range. Splash ruby vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Splash Hessian
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. products.title: Splash Tropez - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash tropez light filtering blind is an elegant grey/ brown colour, it will work well in most spaces due to it's rich earthy tones. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Rock - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash rock light filtering skylight blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Tropez Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tropez is an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.

products.title: Splash Silver Mist Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Silver mist is a soft mid grey shade, a chic addition to modern interiors. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.description: Their splash ruby red perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this bold red perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

Perfect fit roller blinds clip straight onto the window frame, which provides a hassle free, no drilling way to update your window. products.title: Splash Dark Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash dark grey is a stylish, on trend colour which will work well throughout the home, particularly in kitchens and bathrooms as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. This blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. products.title: Splash Chilli Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash chilli red perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this medium red perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Chilli Red Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash chilli red panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The medium red panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.
